description: A custom line item is an one time charge that is applied to a specific billing group's bill.

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Type.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: FEE | CREDIT  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: (arn:aws(-cn)?:billingconductor::[0-9]{12}:(customlineitem|billinggroup)/)?[a-zA-Z0-9]{10,12}  
Update requires: No interruption

ChildAssociatedResources.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

PercentageValue.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Number  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Number  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Attribute.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: LINE_ITEM_TYPE  
Update requires: No interruption

MatchOption.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NOT_EQUAL  
Update requires: No interruption

Values.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes

Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

LineItemFilterValue.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SAVINGS_PLAN_NEGATION  
Update requires: No interruption

InclusiveStartBillingPeriod.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: \d{4}-(0?[1-9]|1[012])  
Update requires: No interruption

ExclusiveEndBillingPeriod.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: \d{4}-(0?[1-9]|1[012])  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_\+=\.\-@]+  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

BillingGroupArn.markdownDescription:
Billing Group ARN

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws(-cn)?:billingconductor::[0-9]{12}:billinggroup/?[0-9]{12}  
Update requires: Replacement

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Type: String
